Package monsterfighter.ui.gui

Class Gui

java.lang.Object
monsterfighter.ui.gui.Gui
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameEnvironmentUi
public class Gui extends Object implements GameEnvironmentUi
A graphical user interface that links to a GameEnvironment Class adapted from the Gui class in the seng201 RocketManager example project.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public void setup(GameEnvironment gameEnvironment)
      Description copied from interface: GameEnvironmentUi
      Initialises this UI and sets up the given GameEnvironment with the available monsters and items. Note that setup need not be complete by the time this method returns. Once setup is complete this UI must call GameEnvironment.onSetupFinished(String, int, Monster, String, monsterfighter.core.GameEnvironment.Difficulty). Method adapted from the seng201 rocket manager example project.
      Specified by:
      setup in interface GameEnvironmentUi
      Parameters:
      gameEnvironment - The game environment that this UI interacts with

    • showError

      Reports the given error to the user. Method adapted from the seng201 rocket manager example project.
      Specified by:
      showError in interface GameEnvironmentUi
      Parameters:
      error - The error to display

      Description copied from interface: GameEnvironmentUi
